title.narrative: OUTPUT 4.1: JUSTICE FOR CHILDREN

description.narrative: Output 4.1: By 2026, All children, including adolescents, have increased and equitable access to strengthened laws and policies and improved child-friendly, gender-responsive services across the justice system,including in climate-affected locations and other humanitarian settings., which contributes to Prevention Of Harmful Practice, Promotion Of Care, Mental Health And Psychosocial Well-Being And Justice, Promotion Of Care, Mental Health And Psychosocial Well-Being And Justice (Covid), Protection From Violence, Exploitation, Abuse And Neglect. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building, Systems Strengthening To Leave No One Behind. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Outcome 4 - Child Protection: By 2026, all children, including adolescents, are better protected from all forms of violence, abuse, exploitation and neglect and harmful traditional practices

sector.narrative: Access to child-friendly and gender-responsive justice processes and procedures
Justice sector workforce strengthening and capacity building
Justice, law and order policy, planning and administration
Promoting diversion and alternatives to deprivation of liberty
Technical assistance - Prevention and response services for violence against children

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Output 4.1: By 2026, All children, including adolescents, have increased and equitable access to strengthened laws and policiesand improved child-friendly, gender-responsive services across the justice system,including in climate-affected locations and otherhumanitarian settings.

target.value: 2026:The minimum age of 12 for criminal responsibilities is operational

title.narrative: Database for children in conflict and contact with the law is established, Text
